description: The Marsupino family has been running this trattoria enthusiastically and warmly since 1901. The chef's suggestion pays homage to the territory in accordance with tradition and the wine cellar, managed by the friendly expert Luca, is immense, with an excellent choice by the glass. Five rooms and two suites in the adjacent late nineteenth-century palazzo.
creditCards: ['American Express credit card', ' Credit card / Debit card accepted', ' Mastercard credit card', ' Visa credit card']
